item.title: Human experience for Transhuman
item.description: -- Human experience for Transhuman Speculative Design | 2018, Academic Work | ONGOING Concept Human experience for Transhuman in 2075 Not to forget “human” emotion, transhuman children wear the device in their head. This suspends their implanted AI and They can think “as human”. Transhuman children go to transhuman-only school and this experience is taught in the “human history” class. User’s Manual Settings What kind of tools are used by children who were born transhuman in the age of post-singularity?

item.title: Speculative Thinking
item.description: Speculative Thinking Design Research | 2016, Personal Work My Design Policy Speculative Fusion of Design and Science The following chart is my own thought of the speculative fusion of design and science. In the business field, we have been creating probable futures using industrial solutions. Currently, through a collaboration with designers, technologists and business strategists, we can imagine and develop further plausible futures based on emerging technologies. Additionally, we must speculate possible futures that research-level technologies promise, and discuss the cultural and political mechanisms behind them to overcome our 21st-century problems.
